front.title: Framework Architecture for Service in the PSTN/IN Requesting Internet Service (SPIRITS)

abstract.t: This document defines an architecture framework and functional requirements for Service in the PSTN/IN Requesting Internet Service (SPIRITS). The framework describes relationships between functional entities for interactions between the PSTN and SPIRITS Server and provides requirements for the SPIRITS protocol. This document is submitted to the IETF SPIRITS working group for discussion and comment. Discussion on this topic should be sent to the SPIRITS mailing list (spirits@lists.research.bell-labs.com).
